General.Name: Treasure Global Inc.
General.Description: Treasure Global Inc. through its subsidiary, ZCity Sdn. Bhd., offers payment processing and e-commerce services. The company provides an online-to-offline e-commerce platform that offers consumers and merchants instant rebates and affiliate cashback programs with e-payment solution and rebates in both e-commerce and physical retailers/merchant settings. It also offers ZCITY App, a payment gateway platform. Treasure Global Inc. was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 276 5th Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10001
